noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1401-2017 to designate 7, 9 and 11 Gloucester Street (Hugh Matheson Houses) (Toronto Centre-Rosedale, Ward 27) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE34.45 - Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act - 7-11 Gloucester Street
By-law 1401-2017 - To designate the property at 7, 9 and 11 Gloucester Street (Hugh Matheson Houses) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1401-2017 - 7, 9 and 11 Gloucester Street (Hugh Matheson Houses)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
